title: How to change the values in nn.Embedding?
body_html:
I first pretrain word2vec using gemsim.models.word2vec, then I want copy the values to embeddings in Pytorch, but
`
embed = nn.Embedding(2,3)

index = Variable(torch.LongTensor([1]))

embed(index).data = torch.Tensor([1,1,1])
`
the code above cannot change the value in embed.
body_text:
I first pretrain word2vec using gemsim.models.word2vec, then I want copy the values to embeddings in Pytorch, but
`
embed = nn.Embedding(2,3)
index = Variable(torch.LongTensor([1]))
embed(index).data = torch.Tensor([1,1,1])
`
the code above cannot change the value in embed.
body:
I first pretrain word2vec using gemsim.models.word2vec, then I want copy the values to embeddings in Pytorch, but
`
embed = nn.Embedding(2,3)

index = Variable(torch.LongTensor([1]))

embed(index).data = torch.Tensor([1,1,1])
`
the code above cannot change the value in embed.
